typedef.name: kld_graph_node_t
typedef.brief: TODO Seperate these out into seperate headers and implementation files

function.name: graph_get_node
function.brief: Returns the kld_graph_node_t of the passed in **id**.

return.doc: the kld_graph_node_t stored in the kld_graph_t **g** with the specified **id**.

argument.name: g
argument.doc: the kld_graph_t in which to retrieve the kld_graph_node_t

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the id of the desired kld_graph_node_t

function.name: new_graph_node
function.brief: Creates and rEturns a new kld_graph_node
